title: Ticket #3265: Shadow sets wrong x509userproxysubject attribute in job ad
description:
The job attribute x509userproxysubject is set by condor_submit to the identity of the job's X509 proxy, if it has one. In 7.9.0, code was added to update proxy-related attributes in the job ad when the shadow detects that the proxy has been updated in-place. The shadow is setting x509userproxysubject to the new proxy's subject name (which is different than the identity).

The code in RemoteResource::checkX509Proxy() should be calling x509_proxy_identity_name(), not x509_proxy_subject_name(), to get the value for x509userproxysubject.
